seed_pair.target: No es verdad que cualquiera pueda ganar el juego.
seed_pair.known: It isn't true that anyone can win the game.

seed_pair.target: No escuchará cada palabra que dices.
seed_pair.known: She won't listen to every word you say.

seed_pair.target: No vayamos afuera con este clima espantoso.
seed_pair.known: Let's not go outside in this dreadful weather.

seed_pair.target: Hizo una promesa de que no elegiría el trabajo equivocado.
seed_pair.known: He made a promise that he wouldn't choose the wrong job.

seed_pair.target: Solía pensar que ser loco era malo.
seed_pair.known: I used to think that being crazy was bad.

seed_pair.target: No quiero parecer como si no me importara.
seed_pair.known: I don't want to seem as though I don't care.

seed_pair.target: No me importa si quieres irte sin el coche.
seed_pair.known: I don't mind if you want to leave without the car.
